1 name: Build and test
 2 
 3 on: [push]
 4 
 5 jobs:
 6   build:
 7     runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}
 8     strategy:
 9       matrix:
10         os: [ubuntu-latest, macOS-latest]
11 
12     steps:
13     - uses: actions/checkout@v1
14 
15     - name: Install mercurial (macOS)
16       if: contains(matrix.os, 'mac')
17       run: brew install mercurial
18 
19     - name: Build with Gradle
20       run: sh gradlew build
